EmailTemplate.name: 05-19-22 Hos NRA Customer invitation.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Will you be at NRA? Join us for a happy hour
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Will we see you at the National Restaurant Show in Chicago this weekend? We're looking forward to being at the show, and hope you will too. If you're planning on attending, we'd love to invite you to join us for an evening of fun. NCR is hosting a celebration event at Utopian Tailgate in downtown Chicago. Sunday, May 22 from 6-9 pmUtopian Tailgate, Chicago, IL <[[https://www.utopiantailgate.com/]]>  Drinks and food are on us. Come join us for great mingling, fun games and amazing rooftop views of Chicago. Let us know you're coming! Spaces are limited - so be sure to register soon. We hope to see you there.  ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
